author: Pete Evans
title: Stock markets rebound as U.S. nears $2T stimulus deal
description: Stock markets in New York and Toronto jump significantly higher on hopes that trillions of dollars in stimulus spending by governments around the world will be enough to offset the economic damage wrought by the coronavirus that causes COVID-19.
content:
Stock markets in New York and Toronto jumped significantly higher on Monday on hopes that trillions of dollars in stimulus spending by governments around the world will be enough to offset the economic damage wrought by the coronavirus that causes COVID-19.
